titles.title: Recognizing the importance of honoring the Nation's children and expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that a National Children's Day should be established.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 2/15/2005--Introduced. Recognizes the importance of honoring the Nation's children. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that a National Children's Day should be established in honor of the Nation's children. Encourages adults in the United States to set aside time to support and listen to a child.
